DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine single dose AMG 282 safe healthy subject subject mild atopic asthma .
DOC.brief_title: A First-in-Human , Double Blind , Single Dose Study Healthy Subjects Subjects With Mild Atopic Asthma .
DOC.detailed_description: A single SC IV dose administration AMG 282 healthy subject subject mild atopic asthma exhibit acceptable safety tolerability profile within dose range study .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria ( All subject ) Is current nonsmoker , use nicotine tobacco containing product ( include limit : snuff , chew tobacco , cigar , cigarette , pipe , nicotine patch ) within last 6 month , cumulative smoking history ≤10 pack year . Females must document nonreproductive potential ( ie , postmenopausal [ see definition ] ; OR history hysterectomy ; OR history bilateral salpingectomy ; OR history bilateral oophorectomy ) . Body mass index ( BMI ) ≥ 18.0 ≤ 32.0 kg/m2 screening . ( Subjects mild atopic asthma ) Documented history mild , stable atopic asthma within 2 year screen . Has use inhale shortacting β2agonists ( less twice weekly ) treat asthma . Prebronchodilator force expiratory volume 1 second ( FEV1 ) > 70 % predict screening . Exclusion Criteria ( All subject ) History evidence clinically significant disorder , condition disease , opinion Principal Investigator Amgen medical monitor would pose risk subject safety interfere study evaluation , procedure , completion . Subject history residential exposure tuberculosis without documented history prophylactic treatment tuberculosis subject positive purify protein derivative ( PPD ) QuantiFERON test screening . Subjects document negative PPD QuantiFERON test within 4 week prior screen know tuberculosis exposure travel area tuberculosis need test perform screening . Has donate lose ≥ 500 mL blood plasma within 8 week administration first dose IP . Other criterion may apply .
